title: Everything Prepared Carefully♪
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Nozomi-chan, are the sweets ready?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Yeah, all done! I’m looking forward to Halloween tomorrow.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>The first and second years seem like they’re planning something in secret, but now we’re all set to fire back at them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>They probably want to do the “Give us sweets, or we’ll play a prank on you” thing, but we’ll bewitch them with these sweets we prepared, right~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>All thanks to Nico-chan and Kanata-chan. They made so many cookies.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>There are so many kinds too. Plus.... they all look delicious~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>....Hey, should we try one of them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, I was just about to ask the same thing♪ I’ll take the pumpkin cookie!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Then I’ll have the black cat one! Thanks for the food!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>So good~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>So good~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
